post.description: Create a new area with city, state, village, pincode, and enabled status.

get.description: Display a listing of the resource.

post.description: Store a newly created resource in storage.

put.description: Update the specified resource in storage.

delete.description: Remove the specified resource from storage.

post.summary: Register a new superadmin or admin
post.description: Register a new superadmin or admin.
Registers a new user with a name, contact number, country code, and optional email.

country_code.description: Country code of the user's phone number

post.description: Allows authenticated users to complete their profile by providing additional details.
Logs in a user using contact number and password

post.summary: Verify OTP for authentication or password reset
post.description: Users submit the OTP received via email or phone to verify their identity. The type parameter determines the purpose of OTP verification.

otp.description: The OTP code received via email or phone

post.description: Resends an OTP to the user's registered email or phone number based on the selected contact type.

user_id.description: The ID of the user requesting a new OTP

contact_type.description: The method by which the user wants to receive the OTP

post.description: Send OTP via email or phone for password reset. The user must exist in the database.

contact_type.description: Specify whether OTP should be sent to email or phone

429.description: Too many OTP requests, try again later

post.summary: Change password using old credentials or reset via OTP
post.description: Users can change their password using the old password or reset it via OTP.

type.description: Type of password change request: 'first_time' for initial setup, 'forgot_password' for resetting via OTP, 'change_password' for changing with old password

old_password.description: Old password (Required only if type is 'change_password')

post.description: Logs out the currently authenticated user and deletes their tokens

post.summary: Check if a service is available in a given area
post.description: Checks if a service is available in a given area based on the pincode and service ID. Requires authentication and a completed profile.
Create a new service with name, description, price, and enabled status.

get.description: Get the details of a specific service.

put.description: Update the details of an existing service.

delete.description: Remove a service from the database.

message.example: Data does not found for this user.

tags.name: Service Areas
